name: Premiere Pro Title Style Library
summary: A PRSL file is a video title style library created by Adobe Premiere Pro, a professional video editing application. It contains XML -formatted information about one or more styles that can be applied to titles (stored in .PRTL files), such as headings, intros, and lower-thirds, in a video production. Styles include the font, color, and other text properties, such as drop shadow, bold, and italic.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
